name: kj_vierling
title: King Jo's Vierling Flak
author: TheKingJo
description: Adds the 2-cm-Flak-Vierling to effectively destroy airborne targets. Yes, this turret will ONLY target entities with the trigger_target_mask 'air-unit'. That means the player or entities that are able to be targeted and got the mask assigned to by other mods.
